app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Voice Recorder Memo Recording
app_description: Voice Recorder by AppGeneration is the easiest most flexible and modern voice recorder ever! Download it for FREE! It turns your iPhone or iPad into a portable audio recorder for any kind of professional and personal recordings and voice memos: working meetings classrooms lectures speeches personal notes and more. With Voice Recorder you can create powerful professional audio recordings in multiple formats edit them with several customized options and manage share with others. Features: Unlimited recordings Multiple supported formats: m4a mp3 WAV CAF and AIFF Transcribe recordings Using advanced Speech to Text in several languages Text notes Add text notes to your recordings Cloud support Save your recording on your device or save them into iCloud Share recordings Send your audio recordings to friends Edit your audio immediately Trim Merge etc. Add several audio effects pitch equalizer delay etc. Add background audio beach city rain etc. Manage your recordings in a calendar view Search and favorite functions. Voice Recorder is the only application that you will need on your iPhone or iPad to take personal and professional recordings and audio memos! About subscriptions: We offer our users the option to subscribe myCalc with a great advantage! The subscription period that we offer is 1 month using Apple ID account. The subscription price is shown in the process of subscription. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase. 1 Month subscription: 0.99 US 0.79 0 99 Please visit our privacy policy and terms of use if you have any doubts: https: www.appgeneration.com privacy https: www.appgeneration.com terms voice recorder.html
